name: Mars Explorer (GavinCraft_Makes)
description:
Go on a long totally not short quest to find water on mars!  Featuring USA Space Bot. This game was Made for the Mini Jam 77 Game Jam!

V1.1 Update News:

The First Update Is Here! Improving Combat Mechanics and adding death.

V1.2 Update News:

A New Update Approaches Finishing The First Level In The Game, Also The "Game Jam Secrets" Have Been Removed.

V2.0 Update News:

Fixed Ladder Bugs, Began Level 2 Development, Added Falling Death Trigger For Level 1, Improved Enemy Movement.

ANOUNCEMENT: This Game is no longer in development there will be no more updates.
